channel.title: cisco on ThinkSide
channel.description: Recent content in cisco on ThinkSide

item.title: Releasing IP from DHCP pool of a cisco router
item.description: gateway#show ip dhcp binding Bindings from all pools not associated with VRF: IP address Client-ID/ Lease expiration Type Hardware address/ User name 192.168.2.22 0100.123f.8e52.06 Apr 17 2009 03:41 PM Automatic 192.168.2.25 0100.0244.3908.79 Apr 17 2009 03:13 PM Automatic 192.168.2.59 0100.1500.2020.6b Apr 17 2009 03:42 PM Automatic 192.168.2.134 0100.016c.cb00.0e Apr 17 2009 03:12 PM Automatic gateway#clear ip dhcp binding 192.168.2.25 gateway#show ip dhcp binding Bindings from all pools not associated with VRF: IP address Client-ID/ Lease expiration Type Hardware address/ User name 192.

item.title: Displaying DHCP clients from the CLI of a CISCO 877 router
item.description: gateway#show ip dhcp binding Bindings from all pools not associated with VRF: IP address Client-ID/ Lease expiration Type Hardware address/ User name 192.168.2.23 XXXX.XXX.XXXX.XX Jan 12 2009 05:12 PM Automatic 192.168.2.27 XXXX.XXXX.XXXX.XX Jan 12 2009 05:20 PM Automatic gateway# XXXX.XXXX.XXXX.XX = MAC address of server or network appliance.
